pullrequest.title: Example scripts for controlling arms, neck and head

content.raw: I noticed that all the joints from Forearm to the hand don't move when a command in sent (joints {L/R}ForearmYaw, WristRoll, WristPitch). The same way it doesn't look like the neck or the head can be controlled. Is that the expected behavior?
content.html: I noticed that all the joints from Forearm to the hand don't move when a command in sent (joints {L/R}ForearmYaw, WristRoll, WristPitch). The same way it doesn't look like the neck or the head can be controlled. Is that the expected behavior?
